content: I am a quantitative geneticist at the Holstein Cattle Association of Japan in Hokkaido Branch. And also I am a visiting scholoar of Dr. Morota’s lab at Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University.
summary: I am a quantitative geneticist at the Holstein Cattle Association of Japan in Hokkaido Branch. And also I am a visiting scholoar of Dr. Morota’s lab at Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University.
title: Toshimi Baba
